title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys
name: Surfing on TiddlyWiki
author: oeyoews
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/readme","text":" !! NOTE * because of newline, this shortcut not work, need use vscode to remove this(for dev plugin) * This plugin is part of neotw(not general maybe) !! TODO * add tip for repeat press this shortcut * can't scroll to determined tiddler repreat * another usage is if your tiddlywiki get bad, you can't find any buttons because of install some stanger plugins(even enable safemode), now you can press ctrl I to call setting * add system image for tips use class Customized shortcuts with `⌨️` at the beginning of description in [[shortcuts|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/KeyboardShortcuts]] or press alt h "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/close-all":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/close-all","code-body":"yes","key":"((close-all))","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-all-tiddlers"/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/control":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/control","caption":"Settings","key":"((control))","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","text":"<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList"> <$action-navigate $to="$:/ControlPanel" $scroll="yes"/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/fullscreen":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/fullscreen","key":"((fullscreen))","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","text":"<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-full-screen"/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/get-plugins":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/get-plugins","caption":"search-filter","key":"((get-plugins))","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","text":"<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList"> <$action-navigate $to="$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Plugins" $scroll="yes"/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/help":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/help","key":"((help))","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","text":"<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/keyboard-list"/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/home-page":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/home-page","code-body":"yes","key":"((home-page))","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-all-tiddlers"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-home"/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/install-plugins":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/install-plugins","caption":"install-plugins","key":"((install-plugins))","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","text":"<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList"> <$action-navigate $to="$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Modals/AddPlugins" $scroll="yes"/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/search-filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/search-filter","caption":"search-filter","key":"((search-filter))","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","text":"<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList"> <$action-navigate $to="$:/AdvancedSearch" $scroll="yes"/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/snippet":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/snippet","caption":"snippet","key":"((snippet))","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","text":"<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title="neotw/snippet/" tags="$:/tags/TextEditor/Snippet" caption={{$:/language/Buttons/Stamp/New/Title}} text={{$:/language/Buttons/Stamp/New/Text}} /> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-suringkeys/button/help":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-suringkeys/button/help","","text":"<$list filter="[[$:/info/browser/is/mobile]get[text]else[no]match[no]]"> <$list filter="[[$:/state/notebook-sidebar]get[text]else[no]match[no]]">
<$button> ⌨️ <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/keyboard-list"/>
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/icon","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/keyboard-list":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/keyboard-list","subtitle":"Neotw Keyboard List","mask-closable":"yes","text":"{{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/KeyboardShortcuts}} "},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/close-all":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/close-all","text":"⌨️ Close all tiddlers"},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/control":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/control","text":"⌨️ Jump to Setting "},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/fullscreen":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/fullscreen","text":"⌨️ FullScreen "},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/get-plugins":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/get-plugins","text":"⌨️ Jump to get-plugins "},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/help":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/help","text":"⌨️ neotw-help "},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/home-page":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/home-page","text":"⌨️ Return Home "},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/install-plugins":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/install-plugins","text":"⌨️ Jump Install Ui "},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/search-filter":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/search-filter","text":"⌨️ Jump to search filter "},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/snippet":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/snippet","text":"⌨️ Create snippet "},"$:/config/shortcuts/close-all":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/close-all","text":"ctrl-alt-c"},"$:/config/shortcuts/control":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/control","text":"ctrl-I"},"$:/config/shortcuts/fullscreen":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/fullscreen","text":"alt-F"},"$:/config/shortcuts/get-plugins":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/get-plugins","text":"ctrl-g"},"$:/config/shortcuts/help":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/help","text":"alt-H"},"$:/config/shortcuts/home-page":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/home-page","text":"ctrl-h"},"$:/config/shortcuts/install-plugins":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/install-plugins","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"ctrl-shift-u"},"$:/config/shortcuts/search-filter":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/search-filter","text":"ctrl-k"},"$:/config/shortcuts/snippet":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/snippet","text":"alt-S"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/style":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/style","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":".neotw-surfing-keys { position: fixed; right: 1em; bottom: 5px; z-index: 2; } "}}}
